trans-unit.source: Represents an extension that enables the customization of the cache sharing levels, the settings of the channel factory cache, and the settings of the channel cache for workflows that send messages to service endpoints using <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send"></xref> messaging activities.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en filtype som aktiverer tilpassing av hurtigbufferen dele nivåer, innstillingene for hurtigbufferen kanal fabrikkinnstillinger og innstillingene for hurtigbufferen kanal for arbeidsflyter som sende meldinger til tjenesten endepunkt ved hjelp av <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send"> </xref> meldingstjeneste aktiviteter.

trans-unit.source: This class is intended for workflows that send messages to service endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen er ment for arbeidsflyter som sende meldinger til tjenesten endepunkt.

trans-unit.source: These workflows are typically client workflows but could also be workflow services that are hosted in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost>.
trans-unit.target: Disse arbeidsflytene er vanligvis klienten arbeidsflyter, men kan også være arbeidsflyttjenestene som er vert for en <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: By default, in a workflow hosted by a <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost>, the cache used by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> messaging activities is shared across all workflow instances in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost> (host-level caching).
trans-unit.target: Som standard i en arbeidsflyt ved en <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost>, hurtigbufferen brukes av <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send>meldingstjeneste aktiviteter deles på tvers av alle arbeidsflytforekomster i den <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost>(vert nivå hurtigbufring).</xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: For a client workflow that is not hosted by a <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost>, the cache is available only to the workflow instance (instance-level caching).
trans-unit.target: For en klient arbeidsflyt ikke er vert for en <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost>, hurtigbufferen er bare tilgjengelig for arbeidsflytforekomsten (forekomstnivå hurtigbufring).</xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: Caching is disabled by default for any send activity in your workflow that has endpoints defined in configuration.
trans-unit.target: Hurtigbufring er deaktivert som standard for alle sendeaktiviteten i arbeidsflyten som har endepunkt som er angitt i konfigurasjonen.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] how to change the default cache sharing levels and cache settings for the channel factory and channel cache, see [Changing the Cache Sharing Levels for Send Activities](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]hvordan du endre standard hurtigbufferen deling nivåer og innstillinger for kanalen fabrikkinnstillinger og hurtigbuffer kanalen for hurtigbuffer, kan du se [endrer hurtigbufferen deling nivåer for sende aktiviteter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendMessageChannelCache"></xref> class with default factory cache and channel cache settings.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendMessageChannelCache"> </xref> klassen med standard buffer og kanal hurtigbufferen fabrikkinnstillinger.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendMessageChannelCache"></xref> class with custom factory cache and channel cache settings.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendMessageChannelCache"> </xref> klasse egendefinerte buffer og kanal hurtigbufferen fabrikkinnstillinger.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] channel factories, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory%601>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]kanalen fabrikker, se <xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory>og <xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory%601>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory%601> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory>

trans-unit.source: You can choose to use only the channel factory cache and disable the channel cache by passing the `channelSettings` parameter to this constructor initialized to a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ChannelCacheSettings> instance with a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ChannelCacheSettings.MaxItemsInCache%2A> value of 0.
trans-unit.target: Du kan velge å bruke bare kanal fabrikken hurtigbufferen og deaktivere hurtigbufferen kanal ved å sende den `channelSettings` parameteren til denne konstruktøren initialisert til en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ChannelCacheSettings>serverforekomsten med en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ChannelCacheSettings.MaxItemsInCache%2A>verdien 0.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ChannelCacheSettings.MaxItemsInCache%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ChannelCacheSettings>

trans-unit.source: To disable the cache completely for both the channel factory cache and the channel cache, pass the `factorySettings` parameter to this constructor initialized to a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ChannelCacheSettings> instance with a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ChannelCacheSettings.MaxItemsInCache%2A> value of 0.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil deaktivere bufferen fullstendig for både hurtigbufferen kanal fabrikkinnstillinger og hurtigbufferen kanal, sendes det `factorySettings` parameteren til denne konstruktøren initialisert til en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ChannelCacheSettings>serverforekomsten med en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ChannelCacheSettings.MaxItemsInCache%2A>verdien 0.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ChannelCacheSettings.MaxItemsInCache%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ChannelCacheSettings>

trans-unit.source: Note that you cannot turn the channel cache on if the channel factory cache is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Vær oppmerksom på at du ikke kan aktivere hurtigbufferen kanal hvis kanal fabrikken hurtigbufferen er deaktivert.

trans-unit.source: The cache settings for cached channel factories.
trans-unit.target: Hurtigbufferinnstillinger for for bufrede kanal fabrikker.

trans-unit.source: The cache settings for cached channels.
trans-unit.target: Hurtigbufferinnstillinger for for bufrede kanaler.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendMessageChannelCache"></xref> class with custom factory cache settings, custom channel cache settings, and a value that indicates whether to turn caching on.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendMessageChannelCache"> </xref> klasse egendefinerte fabrikkinnstillinger hurtigbufferen for egendefinert kanal bufferinnstillingene og en verdi som angir om å aktivere hurtigbufring.

trans-unit.source: By default, the cache is only available for <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> activities that don’t use endpoints defined in configuration.
trans-unit.target: Som standard hurtigbufferen er bare tilgjengelig for <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send>aktiviteter som ikke bruker endepunkt som er angitt i konfigurasjonen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send>

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to turn caching on in this case call this constructor with the `allowUnsafeCaching` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Men hvis du vil aktivere hurtigbufring for i dette tilfellet kalle denne konstruktøren med den `allowUnsafeCaching` parameteren satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: Next, add the new instance of this class as an extension to a workflow service host or a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Neste Legg til ny forekomst av denne klassen som en utvidelse Tjenesteverten en arbeidsflyt eller en arbeidsflytforekomst.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] channel factories, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory%601>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]kanalen fabrikker, se <xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory>og <xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory%601>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory%601> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory>

trans-unit.source: The cache settings for cached channel factories.
trans-unit.target: Hurtigbufferinnstillinger for for bufrede kanal fabrikker.

trans-unit.source: The cache settings for cached channels.
trans-unit.target: Hurtigbufferinnstillinger for for bufrede kanaler.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to turn caching on; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å aktivere hurtigbufring for; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to turn caching on.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om å aktivere hurtigbufring.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> activity in your workflow has endpoints defined in configuration caching could be unsecure and therefore is disabled by default.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send>aktivitet i arbeidsflyten har endepunkt som er angitt i konfigurasjonen av hurtigbufring kan være usikker, og derfor er deaktivert som standard.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send>

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to turn caching on set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Men hvis du vil aktivere hurtigbufring på angi denne egenskapen `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to turn caching on; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å aktivere hurtigbufring for; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the settings of the channel cache.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir innstillingene for hurtigbufferen kanal.

trans-unit.source: The settings of the channel cache.
trans-unit.target: Innstillingene for hurtigbufferen kanal.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendMessageChannelCache"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av den gjeldende forekomsten av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendMessageChannelCache"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the settings of the channel factory cache.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir innstillingene for hurtigbufferen kanal fabrikkinnstillinger.

trans-unit.source: The channel factory cache represents cached channel factories.
trans-unit.target: Hurtigbufferen kanal fabrikken representerer bufrede kanal fabrikker.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] channel factories, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory%601>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]kanalen fabrikker, se <xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory>og <xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory%601>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory%601> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory>

trans-unit.source: The settings of the channel factory cache.
trans-unit.target: Innstillingene for hurtigbufferen kanal fabrikkinnstillinger.
